item.title: Rensselaer at Work Information Session Scheduled for July 24
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 24, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., will be reviewing the online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates. Expect to hear details about how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment. Please RSVP if you plan to attend and learn more about Rensselaer at Work.

item.title: DotCIO announcing Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on 10/14/2025
item.description:
Microsoft Windows 10 support ends on October 14th, 2025. This means that as of this date, most Windows 10 systems will cease to be eligible for support including important security patches. Without appropriate mitigation, Windows 10 systems will be non-compliant with multiple RPI security policies and may be denied access to the campus network in order to reduce risk and maintain a secure cybersecurity posture.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
